about_the_game:
In ItsyRealm, you're on an awesome quest to discover the secrets of a necromancer god only known as the Empty King. Fight, explore, craft, and quest your way through this single-player-focused cutesy RPG.




Along your way, you'll have to think on your feet using staff, sword, and bow to fight mythical monsters and eldritch abominations! You can switch your class even in the middle of battle to exploit openings in your foe's defenses! All the while strategically using special attacks and defensive abilities to slay your foes before they slay you...



Use 21 skills to gather, craft, and wield powerful equipment from dangerous dungeons, teeming forests, ancient ruins, the open sea, and more! Mine those ores, cut those trees, and fish those fish using gathering skills. Then craft them into weapons, armor, and food using artisan skills and wield them using your combat skills!




Help a bunch of like-minded adventurers achieve their own victories! Decisions must be made during your adventure on who to help, who to fight, and who to betray - think wisely or you might just be alone when you face The Empty King!




Be your authentic self with tons of customization options!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 or similar
  • Processor: Intel i5 4xxx series or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 600 series of equivalent
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 or similar
  • Processor: Intel i7 4xxx series or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVidia 1xxx series of equivalent

short_description: Battle eldritch horrors for legendary loot by leveling up your skills and crafting gear in a solo adventure with the feel of a quirky MMO! Gather allies and make enemies as you discover the secrets of a necromancer-turned-god. Will you be the champion or the scourge of the Realm?
